title: xAI, El Salvador announce world’s first nationwide AI education program

content: WASHINGTON - US-based artificial intelligence firm xAI announced a partnership Friday with the government of El Salvador to launch the world’s first nationwide AI-powered education program. xAI said its Grok model will be deployed to more than 5,000 ... [714 chars]

title: Google CEO: Do NOT “Blindly” Trust Artificial Intelligence
description: Delve into the AI trust concerns as Sundar Pichai discusses the limitations and risks of relying on artificial intelligence.
content:
Google CEO Sundar Pichai has warned people against “blindly” trusting artificial intelligence. Pichai stated that the AI engines remain vulnerable in terms of factual accuracy and cannot be fully trusted.
In an interview with the BBC, which aired on ... [1818 chars]

title: Trump signs executive order to block state AI regulations
description: President Donald Trump signed an executive order Thursday aimed at blocking states from crafting their own regulations for artificial intelligence, saying the burgeoning industry is at risk of being stifled by a patchwork of onerous rules while in a battle with Chinese competitors for supremacy.
content: President Donald Trump signed an executive order Thursday aimed at blocking states from crafting their own regulations for artificial intelligence, saying the burgeoning industry is at risk of being stifled by a patchwork of onerous rules while in a ... [2116 chars]

title: Trump's AI order faces political and legal hurdles
description: U.S. President Donald Trump's executive order seeking to bar state laws on artificial intelligence that he says slow innovation will face political and legal opposition from states seeking to preserve their right to regulate the rapidly growing technology.

title: Ministry of education sets up AI healthcare centre at IISc Bengaluru
description: Bengaluru: The ministry of education has established a new artificial intelligence (AI) Centre of Excellence (CoE) for Healthcare at Indian Institute .
content: Bengaluru: The ministry of education has established a new artificial intelligence (AI) Centre of Excellence (CoE) for Healthcare at Indian Institute of Science (IISc), aiming to accelerate use of AI in disease detection and primary care. The centre,... [1423 chars]

title: White House AI Czar Defends Trump Push to Rein In State Rules
description: White House AI czar David Sacks defended President Donald Trump’s push to rein in state-level regulation of artificial intelligence over objections from Democrats, saying the move seeks to ease a growing compliance burden for companies.
